## addAuthoringContentTypeIfNonExistentAction variable

Adds this content type to the store only if the type does not exist, yet. If the type does not exist, this triggers a [addAuthoringContentTypeAction](./redux-feature-auth-type.addauthoringcontenttypeaction.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addAuthoringContentTypeIfNonExistentAction: UnaryFunction<AuthoringType, AddAuthoringContentTypeIfNonExistentAction>
```
